column1: Data Supplied By: National Livestock Reporting Service
Data source: National Livestock Reporting Service
Please see terms of use here: https://www.mla.com.au/general/Terms-and-conditions/data-and-information/

There was a slightly larger yarding of 66 cattle at Powranna on Tuesday with most being export cattle. All cattle met a stronger market with grown steers and bullocks gaining 30c/kg. The few yearling steers made 288c to 296c, grown steers and bullocks 256c to 300c and heavy export heifers 278c to 298c.

The few heavy cows made 196c to 230c, leaner 158c to 186c and very lean 138c to 160c/kg.

Market Reporter Richard Bailey
